title: Kasumin’s Perfect Plan : Day 5
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>*Pant*, *Pant*.... Today is really hot, huh….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>It’s good to be blessed by such a nice weather, but I guess it’s problematic when it’s this hot<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Well, it’s always great to work up a good sweat<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>So hot~, I can’t~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hey everyone~, Kasumin brought some towels~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Thank you, Kasumi-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kufufu, Kasumin soaked it in ice water and made it really cold…. The coldness should surprise everyone….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Did you say something, Kasumi?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Nope! Nothing! Come on, here you go~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Hyaah!? What is this~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hihihi, success~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>It’s so nice and cold-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s the best, little demon!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>A cold towel feels so nice on your body after you get it all heated up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>It really does. It just wipes all the sweat away<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>N-, no way….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>You should use it too, Kasumi, it feels good, here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Pyaaah----!! What, what are you doing! Don’t surprise Kasumin by pressing it against Kasumin’s neck suddenly like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s nice, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Grrr~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Phew…. We’re all refreshed thanks to the towels that Kasumi-chan prepared huh. Alright, everyone, next up we’re doing the hell triathlon that you’ve all been waiting for-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Nooooo!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Nooooo!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
